name: A. Simple Design
statement:
A positive integer is called k-beautiful, if the digit sum of the
decimal representation of this number is divisible by k^{
dagger}. For example, 9272 is 5-beautiful, since the digit sum of 9272
is 9 + 2 + 7 + 2 = 20.You are given two integers x and k. Please find
the smallest integer y
ge x which is k-beautiful.^{
dagger} An integer n is divisible by k if there exists an integer m such
that n = k
cdot m.
editorial:
Let be the answer to the problem. Note that and the problem can be
solved by brute force. We will prove this fact.If the difference between
two numbers is greater than , then there will definitely be a sequence
of numbers where only the last digit differs. Therefore, if the sum of
the digits of a number with the last digit is equal to , then there were
sums of digits equal to . Here, there are exactly consecutive numbers
and for each from to , there exists a number from this range that is
divisible by .
